message.body: Hi milkcat.
How's it going?
It's good! So we just need to chat for the next 23 hours? I was a little confused
Not for the whole time! :) but yeah.
I'm just starting my work day - lots of travel this week. Just got back from France and about to leave for another trip
Ok. Got it. I did the phone conversation study a few years ago. It was fun
Cool!
France!!!! I'm jealous. Where in France?
It was a meeting in Lyon. It was great! But they lost my luggage which was such a pain
Ugh! I just don't understand why that happens so often!! I've never been to Lyon, but would love to go. Something about the French culture just sits well
with me
The culture and esp the food :) Lyon is supposed to be tops for French cuisine
I could eat French food every day! Yum!
Have you ever had a chance to visit France?
I have. I've been to Paris and Reins. I love champagne country.
Sorry reims
I have to go back to France in August for another meeting (poor me) do you recommend Reims for vacation?
Yes! Absolutely. It would be a lovely long weekend. You could touras many of the champagne houses as you can fit in. We went to Mumand MoÃ«t Chandon. And you can stay in a Chateau! Very romantic
Ooh, sounds nice. Did you drive around or take the train?
We took the train from Paris, then we hired a driver to take us to all the champagne houses. It was the most decadent vacation ever!
